name: Captain Kitty: Return of the PB'n'J Sammiches
name_original: Captain Kitty: Return of the PB'n'J Sammiches
description:
The Humanz are starving. It is your duty to defeat the creatures on a mysterious planet and return the PB'n'J sammiches to Earth, preventing this Cat-Astrophe. 

 Left-Click/Right Trigger :  Fire Weapon

WASD/Thumbstick Left: Move

Space/Gamepad A: Jump

Objective: Defeat Creatures, Collect Power-Ups and Return the Sammiches to Earth and save the Humanz. **Please Note: No Cats were harmed during the production of this game.**
